She has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed, manure, pesticide, fertilizer, tools, etc. Delmy has good credit references and is certain she can make her payments on time. At the same time, she is confident she will be able to give her family members the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, pesticide, fertilizer, tools, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con sus padres, ella es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos,  producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, huevos, aceite, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client lives in her own house with her parents.  She is very well known for her humility in the region where she lives, and her hard work in her business.  She has never failed to overcome and has always gotten ahead of her difficulties.  Due to effort and dedication she has a store where she sells high necessity products like basic food products, milk, eggs, and rice among others.  She is dedicated to her work and very helpful when she sells.  Due to this, she has clients that look for her and prefer her products.  She has seen it become necessary to supply her store more because of an increase in demand, and she doesn't have the capital to do so.  

So, she requests a loan to buy more products like basic food products, instant products, sweets, drinks, eggs, oil, etc.  She trusts in God that soon she will receive the requested help and will not have to worry anymore about sustaining her home on a daily basis.

loans.use: to buy basic food products, instant products, sweets, drinks, eggs, oil, etc.

loans.name: Olven Alberto

texts.es: Olven de 30años de edad desde hace 10 años se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y el sorgo, De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, las cuales son muy humildes no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Es un hombre luchador, vive en casa propia con su esposa y su madre. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito y poder comprar los principales insumos agrícolas como abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Olven is 30 years old and has been a farmer for 10 years growing corn and sorghum. In this way he earns a living and can provide every day for his home. He grows crops every year and it is the only way he knows to make a living. He is very hard-working, honorable, and responsible man. In spite of the conditions in which he lives, which are very humble, he doesn't tire of working and providing the best for his family. He is a determined man and lives in his own home with his wife and mother. He has made the decision to seek a loan to be able to buy agricultural products such as fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, etc. He hopes to have favorable results as he doesn't have other sources of income. He trusts in God that he will be able to have an abundant harvest which will permit him to continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 30-year-old married man. He lives in a humble house with his wife and four sons. Ahmad works as an employee in the public sector with a low wage; this wage barely covers the family needs. 

Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help Ahmad buy a new mobile phone that is very necessary for his work and also for personal use. 

Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new mobile phone.

loans.name: Yira Yasmín

texts.es: Yira Yasmín es una mujer de 30 años de edad, madre de una hija de 11 años y vive en unión libre con su actual pareja. Hace 8 años se dedica a la profesión de estilista capilar y corporal, prestando sus servicios a domicilio y complementa con el trabajo en un centro de estética los fines de semana, desempeñándose como manicurista; de esta manera adquiere los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Es una mujer dedicada y trabajadora, se ha capacitado constantemente en dicha actividad y todo lo que hace es con el fin de seguir apoyando a su hija en todo su proceso educativo. Con el crédito que solicita en la Corporación, desea comprar una moto, que le permita ahorrar dinero y tiempo en los traslados de un lugar a otro para cumplir las citas a sus clientes y, de esta forma mejorar la calidad en la prestación de los servicios y atender mayor cantidad de clientes diariamente. Su mayor sueño es generar ingresos que le permitan crear un ahorro programado para conseguir su casa propia en un futuro cercano y poder brindar a su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yira Yasmín is 30 and the mother of an 11-year-old daughter. She lives in a free union with her partner. For eight years, she has been a hair and body stylist, offering in-home services and working at styling salon as a manicurist on weekends. She is able to support her family this way. She is dedicated and hardworking and has received continuous training in these services. Her goal is to keep supporting her daughter's education.

She has applied for a loan to buy a motorcycle, which will save her money and time as she travels from one location to another for client appointments. This will improve the service she offers, and she will be able to serve more clients each day. Her great dream is to create a savings plan to buy a house in the near future and to offer her daughter a better life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to offer in-home services.

loans.name: Nery Xiomara

texts.es:
Nery Xiomara es una señora de 51 años que vive al lado de su hermana mayor en el municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida.

Desde muy pequeña soñó con ser una oficinista y por eso estudió la carrera de secretaria ejecutiva y hoy se desempeña como tal en una Institución de dicho municipio donde tiene varios años de laborar.

Últimamente se ha sentido mal de salud y por su bajo salario que solo alcanza para lo básico de su hogar no ha podido asistir al médico para mejorar su salud, ya que para esto tiene que viajar hasta la ciudad de León y se incurren en una serie de gastos, por tal motivo necesita que los inversionistas de Kiva le financien un crédito a través de Ceprodel para comprar medicamentos, realización de exámenes y pago de consultas médicas con el fin de mejorar su salud y así poder rendir mejor en su trabajo y sentirse bien porque una persona sana es feliz.
texts.en:
Nery Xiomara is 51 and lives with her older sister in the city of El Sauce, where she has lived all her life. As a child, she dreamed of working in an office, and she studied to be an executive secretary. She has worked for several years in this capacity in one of the city's offices.

Lately, she has been in poor health. Her low salary only allows her to meet basic household expenses, so she has not been able to visit a doctor to improve her health. She would have to travel to the city of León and incur expenses to visit a doctor; therefore, she needs a loan from Kiva lenders through Ceprodel to buy medication and to pay for tests and medical appointments to improve her health so that she is able to work better and feel well, as a healthy person is a happy person.

loans.use: to buy medication and to pay for tests and medical appointments.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is 27 years old, married, and blessed with three children. She makes and sells bricks in Chepterit to earn a living. She started her business two years ago. She gets a monthly income of about KES 15,000. She has requested a second loan of KES 60,000 to rent land and pay wages to her casual workers. The profit she earns will be plowed back into her business and pay school fees for her children. Her dream is to see this business expand. She also hopes for a brighter future.

loans.use: To rent land and pay laborers.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is 50 years old, married, and a father of five children. For the last two years, he has earned a living by selling farm produce such as mangoes in Malindi. He earns a monthly profit of about KES 7,050. Francis was introduced to KADET LTD by our credit officer, and is applying for his third loan of KES 20,000, to buy seeds, some fertilizer and other farm inputs needed for his business. He will use the profits made through this loan to pay school fees for his children as well as expand his farming activities. His goal for the future is to venture into mixed farming with a view of increasing his income so as to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs needed for his farming business.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has a nursery academy providing education to young children. She lacks adequate facilities and capital to establish modern classrooms to facilitate her activities.  

With the KES 25,000 she wants to purchase desks and text books for the pupils to use and to provide a good environment for learning. She appreciates the previous Kiva loan.

loans.use: to purchase desks and text books for the pupils.

loans.name: Mkrtich

texts.en:
57 year-old Mkrtich lives in Akhaltsikhe district with his 53 year-old wife. Mkrtich requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected all the time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. The family is without a source of the income at the moment.

Mkrtich requested a loan from Credo to start a family business. Mkrtich has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With his credit Mkrtich will renovate his house to rent out the rooms. He will try his best to make the house look comfortable. After the renovation is done, the rooms will look much better and will increase the rent price. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will give Mkrtich an opportunity to earn an income for the family and significantly improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To renovate his house to rent out the rooms

loans.name: Cruz Alfredo

texts.es: don cruz de 41 años de edad desde hace 8 años se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y el maicillo, de esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Es un hombre luchador, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos. don cruz ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y poder comprar los principales insumos agrícolas como abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Cruz, 41 years old, has been a farmer for 8 years. His main crop is corn and sorghum. This is how he earns a living and can bring his household its daily bread. He farms year after year. He is a very hard-working, honorable, and responsable man. Despite the conditions in which he lives, he does not tire of working and giving his family the best. He is a fighter. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children. Cruz has made the decision to approach INTEGRAL to ask for a loan and to be able to buy the main farming supplies such as manure, insecticide, seeds, etc. He hopes to have favorable results since he does not have another source of income. He trusts in God that he will succeed in having an abundant harvest that will allow him to continue bringing his household its daily bread.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticide, seeds, etc

loans.name: Fedelisa

texts.en:
Fedelisa is 53 years old and married with eight children. With two children currently in school, Fedelisa works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell in her store.

She has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar, shampoo, milk, soft-drinks, canned goods and other groceries. Fedelisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Fanta

texts.en:
Meet 33-year-old Fanta from Moriba town Bo in Sierra Leone. She is married with 5 children between the ages of 9 years and 13 years. Her children are going to school. In 2001, Fanta established her retail business. She began her business because she needed to create income to take care of herself and her family. She works at the business every day from morning to night.  She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and the lack of finances to expand her business.

Fanta requires a loan in order to purchase retail items like candles, cigarettes and biscuits to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and repay her loan. In the future, Fanta plans to expand her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase retail items like candles, cigarettes and biscuits to expand her business

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.ru: Бунафша  молодая и жизнерадостная девушка в возрасте 27 лет. Она замужем и имеет двух красивых деток. Живёт она в небольшом посёлке. Её дети учатся в местной школе, учатся они хорошо и Бунафша мечтает, чтобы её дети получили хорошее образование и у них было хорошее будущее. Для этого она работает не покладая рук. Сама Бунафша работает учительницей в  средней школе своего посёлка. Но зарплата учительницы очень мала, и её едва хватает на проживание. Дополнительный заработок приносит в семью муж. Он находится в России на заработках, работает там строителем. Он каждый месяц по возможности отправляет денежные средства Бунафше. Дом, в котором живёт Бунафша и её семья очень старый и нуждается в ремонте. Этот дом был построен совсем давно и на сегодняшний день находится в плохом состоянии. Но Бунафша с мужем  мечтают  иметь дом с лучшими условиями. Они долго думали и решились взять кредит на ремонт дома. Поэтому Бунафша обратилась в Арванд и собирается взять кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Она верит и надеется на поддержку и заранее благодарит Арванд.
texts.en: Bunafsha is a young and joyful 27-year-old woman. She is married and has two beautiful children. She lives in a small village. Her children study at a local school, they are good students, and Bunafsha dreams that they will receive a good education and have a good future. Because of this, she works tirelessly. Bunafsha works as a teacher in a middle school in her village. However, a teacher's pay is very low and she barely has enough to live on. Her husband brings the family additional income. He is working in Russia as a construction worker. Every month, he sends whatever money he can send to Bunafsha. The house in which Bunafsha and her family live is very old and in need of repair. This house was built a very long time ago, and is currently in poor condition. Bunafsha and her husband dream of having a home in better condition. They have thought about it for a long time, and have decided to take out a loan to repair the house. Because of this, Bunafsha has turned to Avrand and is going to take out a loan to purchase building materials to repair her home. She believes in and hopes for support, and thanks Avrand in advance.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 39 years old and lives in Montserrado County, which has the largest free port and is the number one commercial county in Liberia. She is single and has six children between 24 and 3 years old.  Only one lives at home and attends school. She completed third grade and she describes herself as a very hardworking woman. For the past three years she has been operating a table where she sells pigs feet and cow meat in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her fiance who sells charcoal. She enjoys her business because the business gives her more money. She sells six days a week, from 7 am to 5 pm, and most of the time she uses a bus to get her goods to her table. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pigs feet and cow meat for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs feet and cow meat for her business
